vote.text: Amendment SA 5109 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5109 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S10533-10534; text: CR S10533-10534) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5109 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5109 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
